Package samplers.rollout

Class RolloutPolicy_MultiChildren

  • java.lang.Object
    • samplers.rollout.RolloutPolicy
      • samplers.rollout.RolloutPolicy_MultiChildren
  • public class RolloutPolicy_MultiChildren
extends RolloutPolicy
    To evaluate the score of a node. Run a rollout for each of its potential child nodes. Average them out. If run for all potential children, this can be quite slow.
    Author:
    matt

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      boolean doColdStarts
      Do repeated rollouts as cold-starts? This will be faster for deep trees.
      int maxRollouts
      Maximum number of allowed rollouts.

    • Method Detail

      • rollout

        public float rollout​(Node startNode,
                     GameThreadSafe game)
        Description copied from class: RolloutPolicy
        Do a rollout from a given node. Assumes that the given game is in the state of startNode! Be careful!
        Specified by:
        rollout in class RolloutPolicy
        Parameters:
        startNode - Starting Node to rollout from.
        game - Instance of the game to use. Must already be at the state of startNode.
        Returns:
